actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the earnings test shall not apply in the case of a widow with minor children who is entitled to mother's insurance benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act that outside earnings test shall not apply in the case of a widow with minor children who is entitled to mother's insurance benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the earnings test shall not apply in the case of a widow with minor children who is entitled to mother's insurance benefits.
